name: foxm6 IGP Project
description: This is the final project for my Intro to Game Programming class! It contains all 4 games that we worked on. The Adventure Game is a turn based exploration game without graphics where you search for crystals in the sky. Kaboom Game is a spin off of apple dropper where you must catch all the projectiles that fall from the antagonist. The Shoot Em Up is an arena style shooter with multiple stages and power-ups. Finally, the 2D platformer is a speedrunning game where you use a gravity device to pull you towards and away your targets. Enjoy!
